index.arrow: Get rid of cellulite in 1 course!

point_1.line_2: due to the high content of seaweed extract

bullets.bullet_1: Cream NIVELE is a new scientific development, which fuses all advantages of means of previous generations. A carefully balanced consist and innovative formula make it one of the most effective means to deal with cellulite to date.
bullets.bullet_2: NIVELE cream contains about 50 biologically active substances that act immediately on all causes of the appearance of cellulite. It not only doesn't harm the body, but also heals the skin. The cream has a great prolonged action, due to what prevents the development of cellulite in the future.
bullets.bullet_3: As numerous clinical studies reveal, as well as the experience of using the cream by ordinary customers, NIVELE helps to cope with cellulite in 99% of cases. More than 1 million customers around the world have already chosen this cream, and most of them forgot about the extremely unattractive "orange peel" forever.

list_1.point_8: Improves the metabolism of fat cells

list_2.title: NIVELE cream will clear your skin from cellulite with:

title.line_1: NIVELE cream is easy to use

steps.step_1: Squeeze a small amount of cream on the palm.
steps.step_2: Massaging, apply the cream to problematic areas.

title.line_2: depending on the stage of cellulite:

weeks.title: Full course of NIVELE cream takes only 4 weeks!

week_1.title: 1 Week:
week_1.text: The skin is noticeably tighten it becomes healthier. Gradually, the flaccidness goes.

week_2.title: 2 Week:
week_2.text: Cellulite subsides, the tubercles are less pronounced. The elasticity and resilience of the skin are increased.

week_3.title: 3 Week:
week_3.text: "Orange peel" is weakly evident, the tubercles disappear completely; the skin acquires a healthy color.

week_4.title: 4 Week:
week_4.text: There is no trace of cellulite. The skin becomes beautiful, fit and young. No "orange peel" even if squeezed.

text.p_1: According to the latest statements of doctors, cellulite is not only a cosmetology problem, but a real disease, which affects both men and women.
text.p_2: Сellulite is a change in the structure of subcutaneous fat cells. In the affected areas, the metabolism is disturbed, which leads to abnormal growth of fat cells, accumulation of excess fluid, metabolic products and toxins. All this brought together gives an unattractive look to skin, sadly known so-called “orange peel”.

how.bottom_text: NIVELE cream normalizes the metabolism in all layers of the skin and cleaves the accumulated subcutaneous fat, which leads to a significant decrease in the "orange peel" and the return of elasticity and resilience of the skin.

title.line_1: The basis of the effectiveness of NIVELE
title.line_2: is a high concentration of caffeine

left_side.text_1: Up to date caffeine is the most famous natural stimulating and vasodilating agent, which, thanks to its unique properties, is able to combat subcutaneous fat effectively, activating its’ active cleavage.
left_side.text_2: In addition, caffeine accelerates metabolism, normalizes lymphatic drainage and stimulates blood circulation.

point_1.title: Cola extract
point_1.text: It activates the processes of skin renewal and rejuvenation, increases the permeability of capillaries, improves lymphatic drainage, cleaves subcutaneous fat, improves blood microcirculation and promotes softening and careful removal of surface skin cells.

point_2.title: Seaweed extract
point_2.text: It removes excess fluid from the subcutaneous layers, reduces tubercles and irregularities on the skin, activates the process of splitting fats and removes puffiness. It prevents the appearance of excess fat and excretion products in the intercellular space.

point_3.title: Calendula extract
point_3.text: It cleanses skin cells from toxins, rejuvenates and smoothes the skin, makes it elastic again, improves skin color. It dissolves hydrophobic toxins and improves endocrine glands. The extract also expands the pores, enhances the effect of other ingredients of the cream, ensuring their penetration into the deeper layers of the skin.

title.line_2: from Adamson L. dermatologist cosmetologist, Candidate of Medical Sciences

text.p_1: “To date, the problem of cellulite is more urgent than ever. If earlier this disease, as a rule, appeared at the age of 30-40 years, today signs of cellulite can be seen in 18-year-old girls. And the most terrible thing is that cellulite won't go by itself. Over time, it will only develop further, greatly reducing the attractiveness of a person.
text.p_2: You can get rid of cellulite by using special means. For example, NIVELE cream is a great helper. This is an innovative development of scientists, which uses the most modern technology of cold extraction, which allows saving the maximum of useful substances from plants in the production of the cream.
text.p_3: Due to the high content of extracts of caffeine, seaweed, cola and calendula, NIVELE influences cellulite in a complex way and eliminates all causes of its appearance. To date, the cream XXX is one of the most effective and safe means to fight cellulite, which I recommend to all my patients.”

customer_1.author: Sarah, 34 y.o.
customer_1.text: “The cream is wonderful! I had a cellulite, which I could not get rid of for several years. I've tried different means: from various creams and traditional recipes, to anti-cellulite programs in salons. Nothing helped as much as NIVELE. Cellulite was gone in the 90-95% in just a month! Very good cream, especially for this price. Pleasantly surprised”

customer_2.author: Martha, 29 y.o.
customer_2.text: “I liked the effect of the cream. The skin became smoother, resilient and more elastic indeed. I didn’t have a severe cellulite (it appeared during pregnancy), but it passed completely. Moreover, the spider veins disappeared, and the color of the skin improved. I used the cream NIVELE for about 2 weeks. I recommended it to my friend, she also liked it”
